text.div:
GFESubmit

OPERATION: GFESubmit

The official URL for this operation definition is: 

http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pct/OperationDefinition/GFE-submit

URL: [base]/Claim/$gfe-submit

Parameters

UseNameCardinalityTypeBindingDocumentation
INresource1..1Bundle

A Bundle containing a single or multiple GFE resources plus referenced resources.

OUTreturn1..1Bundle

A Bundle containing a single AEOB resource plus referenced resources.

name: GFESubmit
title: Submit a GFE resource for the creation of an AEOB
publisher: HL7 International - Financial Management Work Group

contact.name: HL7 International - Financial Management Work Group

parameter.name: resource
parameter.documentation: A Bundle containing a single or multiple GFE resources plus referenced resources.

parameter.name: return
parameter.documentation: A Bundle containing a single AEOB resource plus referenced resources.
